/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high angle, providing a bird's eye view of the scene. The street, lined with power lines and street lamps, stretches out into the distance, flanked by buildings on both sides. Cars are parked along the sides of the street, adding a touch of urban life to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, with a smattering of clouds visible in the distance. The colors in the image are predominantly blue, green, and gray, painting a picture of a typical day in this bustling city.
